video_prompt: Couple exchanging a blossom with smiles, crouching and extending hands. Blossoms drift down and scatter on the ground. Water shimmers in the background.
image_prompt: A cinematic, eye-level, medium shot of a romantic couple in a cherry blossom park in early spring. A man in a cream sweater offers a cherry blossom to a woman in a pink dress. Soft, warm outdoor lighting, intimate, tranquil lake, and blooming trees in the background. High-resolution details emphasize the natural pink and cream tones.
refined_video_prompt: Hands extend and retract as a couple exchanges a blossom, their smiles visibly widening while they slowly crouch. Blossoms continually drift downwards, gently scattering and accumulating on the ground. The background water actively shimmers, its surface constantly rippling.
